content: {"name": "Charm City Care Connection, Drop-in Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "DROP-IN CENTER: Offers peer groups, activities (movie day, game day, yoga), and counseling. Provides shower and bathroom facilities (available 10AM-2PM pending adequate staffing) and laundry services (last load at 2PM.) Provides syringe access and disposal, safer smoking kits, and overdose education / prevention materials (naloxone and fentanyl test strips.) Offers Wound Care, HEP C + HIV testing and treatment with Baltimore City Health Department Van (every other Wednesday), and COVID-19 vaccine clinics. May provide water, lemonade, and snacks to individuals in need. Offers a hot community lunch to-go every Wednesday. Provides PPE and hand sanitizer to community members. Distributes safer sex materials. Provides on-site case management services from 12:30PM-3:30PM. Call for more information or visit the website: Services - Charm City Care Connection", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1214 North Wolfe Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Baltimore", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21213", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.30504, "longitude": -76.59154}, "phones": [{"number": "(443) 478-3015", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Hot meal is available"}]}
